Package fabric.serialization

Class Message

java.lang.Object
fabric.serialization.Message
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ack, Bout, Challenge, Credentials, Error, Fabric, ID, Knowp
public abstract class Message extends Object
Represents generic portion of message and provides serialization/deserialization You may make concrete anything listed as abstract in this interface. In other words, abstract is not part of the requirement (while the class, method, and parameters are required).

    • decode

      public static Message decode(MessageInput in) throws NullPointerException, ValidationException, IOException
      Deserializes message from input source
      Parameters:
      in - deserialization input source
      Returns:
      a specific message resulting from deserialization
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if parse or validation problem
      IOException - if I/O problem
      NullPointerException - if in is null

      Serializes message to given output sink. Will be overridden by its subclasses.
      Parameters:
      out - serialization output sink
      Throws:
      IOException - if I/O problem
      NullPointerException - if out is null
